effect_entries.effect: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd
poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and
Speed stats of a poisoned target.
